title: On cusp of Final Four, Oregon, Kansas fueled by Elite Eight losses

text: North Carolina forward Isaiah Hicks (4) celebrates a basket during the second half against Butler in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at FedExForum in Memphis. Justin Ford, USA TODAY Sports Baylor guard King McClure reacts after a play during the first half against South Carolina in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at Madison Square Garden in New York. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Sports Baylor forward Johnathan Motley, left, blocks a shot by South Carolina guard Sindarius Thornwell, right, during the first half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at Madison Square Garden in New York. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Sports North Carolina Guard Joel Berry II drives to the basket past Butler center Nate Fowler during the second half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA Tournament at FedExForum in Memphis. Nelson Chenault, USA TODAY Sports North Carolina forward Kennedy Meeks, right, and Butler guard Avery Woodson chase a loose ball in the second half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA Tournament at FedExForum in Memphis. Justin Ford, USA TODAY Sports South Carolina forward Chris Silva, right, jumps onto Baylor forward Johnathan Motley during the first half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at Madison Square Garden in New York. Brad Penner, USA TODAY Sports South Carolina forward Chris Silva (30) shoots against Baylor forward Johnathan Motley (5) during the first half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at Madison Square Garden in New York. Robert Deutsch, USA TODAY Sports Butler guard Kamar Baldwin, right, passes the ball over North Carolina forward Theo Pinson (1) and forward Isaiah Hicks, left, during the first half of their game in the Sweet 16 of the NCAA tournament at FedExForum in Memphis. Justin Ford, USA TODAY Sports North Carolina forward Theo Pinson (1) loses the ball as he collides with Butler forward Andrew Chrabascz (45) during the first half of their game in the Sweet 16 at the NCAA tournament at FedExForum in Memphis. Justin Ford, USA TODAY Sports Xavier's Malcolm Bernard (left) and Trevon Bluiett (5) celebrate after defeating Arizona in the Sweet 16. Stan Szeto, USA TODAY Sports Xavier's Tyrique Jones jumps onto the scorer's table to celebrate a win over Arizona in the Sweet 16. Stan Szeto, USA TODAY Sports Xavier's Quentin Goodin shoots against Arizona during the Sweet 16. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Xavier's J.P. Macura shoots against Arizona's Dusan Ristic during Sweet 16 play. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Xavier's Tyrique Jones dunks against Arizona's Dusan Ristic during Sweet 16 play. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Arizona's Allonzo Trier drives against Xavier's Malcolm Bernard during Sweet 16 play. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Kansas players celebrate their win over Purdue in the Sweet 16. Jay Biggerstaff, USA TODAY Sports Purdue's P.J. Thompson walks off the court following a Sweet 16 loss to Kansas. Jay Biggerstaff, USA TODAY Sports Kansas' Josh Jackson dunks ahead of Purdue's Caleb Swanigan during Sweet 16 play. Jay Biggerstaff, USA TODAY Sports Kansas' Lagerald Vick (2) goes up for a shot against Purdue during Sweet 16 play. Jay Biggerstaff, USA TODAY Sports Kansas' Landen Lucas dunks ahead of Purdue's Carsen Edwards during the Sweet 16. Denny Medley, USA TODAY Sports Purdue center Isaac Haas controls the ball against Kansas forward Dwight Coleby during Sweet 16 play. Denny Medley, USA TODAY Sports Kansas' Devonte' Graham (4) shoots as Purdue's Caleb Swanigan (50) defends during Sweet 16 play. Jay Biggerstaff, USA TODAY Sports Gonzaga players celebrate after defeating West Virginia in the Sweet 16. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Gonzaga's Johnathan Williams (3) attempts a shot against West Virginia's Sagaba Konate during the Sweet 16. Stan Szeto, USA TODAY Sports West Virginia Mountaineers forward Esa Ahmad (23) is foueld by Gonzaga Bulldogs forward Zach Collins (right) during Sweet 16 play in San Jose. Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports Gonzaga Bulldogs guard Nigel Williams-Goss (5) and guard Silas Melson (0) on a fast break against the West Virginia Mountaineers during the first half in the semifinals of the West Regional of the 2017 NCAA Tournament at SAP Center. Stan Szeto, USA TODAY Sports Gonzaga Bulldogs center Przemek Karnowski (24) is defended by West Virginia Mountaineers forward Elijah Macon (45) during the first half in the semifinals of the West Regional of the 2017 NCAA tournament at SAP Center.
